channel.title: Shoes in Bitcoin
channel.description: Recent content on Shoes in Bitcoin

item.description: Shoes in Bitcoin is an educational hub, connecting the best professionals in the Industry with the top worldwide companies. Shoes in Bitcoin’s mission is to provide knowledge about the best in class products and projects with the end aim to match clients, customers, and job seekers/potential candidates. “It is your own responsibility to step in the right shoes.” [Valeriya Georgieva, Founder of Shoes in Bitcoin]

Webinars & Education Episode #7 [24.06.2020] Guest: Marco Amadori, CEO of Inbitcoin Episode #6 [19.05.2020] Guest: Vincenzo di Nicola, CEO & Co-Founder of Conio Episode #5 [08.05.2020] Guests: Yuri de Gaia – Liquiditi.io and Valerio Vaccaro, Bitcoin Expert Blockstream Episode #4 [24.04.2020] Guest: Zoe Faircloth – Marketing Manager at Bitwala GmbH Episode #3 [14.
